select u.id,u.user_name,u.role_code,u.dept_name,u.card_no, u.phone,ur.role_id,r.role_name, u.create_by,u.create_time,u.update_time,u.update_by from t_wms_user u left join t_wms_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.id and ur.del_flag='1' left join t_wms_role r on r.id = ur.role_id and r.del_flag ='1' where u.del_flag ='1'

and u.dept_name like concat('%',#{param.department},'%')
and u.card_no like concat('%',#{param.cardNo},'%')
